name: Plug & Play
author: Bassem Rabia

sections.description:
Plug and Play our feautures and turn your WordPress Blog into a Highly Interactive, Elegant and Secure Blog.

Read more about with this plugin!

Features

  • Hide Admin Bar: Disable WordPress Admin bar for front end user, Speedup your web site loading.
  • WP Generator Meta Tag Remover: Customize your own website loogin form logo.
  • Security Tools: It can be considered a security risk to make your wordpress version visible and public you should hide it.
  • Versus: Shows recently viewed posts by visitor as a sidebar.
  • Maintenance Mode: Easily create a maintenance mode page for your WordPress site.
sections.installation:
• In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  • Search for Plug & Play
  • Click to install
  • Activate the plugin
  • Plug and Play our feautures for WordPress to Turn your WordPress Blog into a Highly Interactive Blog.

Version 1.0 Jan 31st, 2016

  • CHANGED: First release
